name: Space Shuttle Flight Simulator 3D Free
description:
Feel as a real astronaut, control space shuttle and explore the infinity space with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator game in 3D!

Have you ever dream to pilot a realistic space shuttle? We give you a chance to make your dream true! Try Space Shuttle Flight Simulator to gain unusual flight experience. Use NASA technologies, dock to ISS and explore the solar system with this space flight simulator!

Show your worth as an astronaut and have fun with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator! Explore the structure of real spaceship, your shuttle and even an ISS with all its’ moving parts and engines! Enjoy the view of all planets from our solar system and infinity expanses of space!

Launch your shuttle from the spaceport, go into Earth orbit and finally dock the ISS with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator – great app for all ages!

Space Shuttle Flight Simulator features:

- Highly detailed structures of your space shuttle, spaceship and even the ISS
- Picturesque view of Solar System – find all planets there
- The whole cycle of space shuttle launch and flight
- Realistic NASA technologies - feel as a real astronaut

Be ready for ultimate cosmic adventure in 3D! This simulator displays you the structure of a spaceship, space shuttle and even an ISS with its’ engines, moving parts and all planets from our solar system! Become NASA astronaut and have fun with Space Shuttle Flight Simulator – great flight simulator for all tastes! Get into your space shuttle and have a good trip, astronaut! The Solar system and ISS are waiting for you!
